solutions.africa.title: Africa Market Solutions
solutions.africa.desc: Durable pickups and SUVs with high ground clearance, adapted for diverse terrains from Sahara to Sub-Saharan regions
solutions.africa.longDesc: Comprehensive solutions for African markets including compliant documentation, port-to-port logistics, and after-sales support networks
solutions.africa.advantage1.title: Terrain-Optimized Vehicles
solutions.africa.advantage1.desc: High-clearance 4x4s tested for desert, bush, and urban conditions
solutions.africa.advantage2.title: Multi-Port Delivery
solutions.africa.advantage2.desc: Direct shipping to Lagos, Mombasa, Durban, and 15+ African ports
solutions.africa.advantage3.title: Trade Finance Options
solutions.africa.advantage3.desc: LC/TT support with staged payment for established partners
solutions.africa.advantage4.title: Local Compliance
solutions.africa.advantage4.desc: Full documentation for customs, emission standards, and registration

solutions.africa.step1.desc: Identify target countries and vehicle preferences
solutions.africa.step2.title: Vehicle Sourcing
solutions.africa.step3.title: Documentation Prep
solutions.africa.step3.desc: Prepare export docs, invoices, and certificates
solutions.africa.step4.title: Shipping & Tracking
solutions.africa.step4.desc: Ro-Ro or container shipping with real-time updates
solutions.africa.step5.title: Arrival Support
solutions.africa.step5.desc: Customs clearance assistance and delivery coordination
solutions.africa.case1.title: Nigerian Distributor - 200 Units
solutions.africa.case1.desc: Supplied 200 Toyota Hilux pickups to Lagos-based distributor within 45 days
solutions.africa.case2.title: Kenya Fleet Operator
solutions.africa.case2.desc: Mixed fleet of SUVs and vans for Nairobi transportation company
solutions.africa.faq1.a: We support TT, LC, and staged payments for repeat customers with good credit history.
solutions.africa.faq2.q: Which African ports do you ship to?
solutions.africa.faq2.a: Major ports including Lagos, Mombasa, Durban, Dar es Salaam, Abidjan, and more.
solutions.africa.faq3.a: Yes, all vehicles undergo thorough inspection with photo/video documentation before shipment.
solutions.africa.faq4.a: We connect buyers with local service networks and provide parts sourcing assistance.

trust.testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
trust.testimonial1.text: Outstanding service and quality vehicles. Every shipment arrives on time with complete documentation. Highly professional team.
trust.testimonial2.text: Best auto exporter we've worked with. They understand South American market requirements and handle all compliance seamlessly.
trust.testimonial3.text: Reliable partner for 4 years. Their vehicles are exactly as described and logistics coordination is impeccable. Highly recommended.
about.hero.title: Building Global Bridges Through Quality Vehicles
about.hero.subtitle: 15+ years of excellence in automotive export, connecting manufacturers with distributors across 50+ countries
about.mission.title: Our Mission
about.mission.text1: At Rongqi Auto Service, we are committed to simplifying international automotive trade by providing end-to-end export solutions. From sourcing premium vehicles to coordinating global logistics, we ensure every shipment meets the highest standards of quality and compliance.
about.mission.text2: Our dedicated team of export specialists, logistics coordinators, and quality inspectors work together to deliver transparent, reliable, and cost-effective services that help our partners succeed in their local markets.
about.timeline.title: 15 Years of Growth
about.timeline.2010.title: Company Founded
about.timeline.2010.desc: Established in Shanghai with a vision to connect Chinese automotive manufacturers with African importers
about.timeline.2013.title: Middle East Expansion
about.timeline.2013.desc: Opened Dubai office and achieved ISO 9001 certification for quality management
about.timeline.2016.title: 1000+ Vehicles Milestone
about.timeline.2016.desc: Reached 1000 vehicles exported annually, expanded to South American markets
about.timeline.2019.title: Digital Transformation
about.timeline.2019.desc: Launched online platform with real-time inventory and tracking systems
about.timeline.2022.title: 5000 Customers Served
about.timeline.2022.desc: Reached 5000+ satisfied customers across 50+ countries worldwide
about.timeline.2025.title: Industry Leader
about.timeline.2025.desc: Recognized as top-tier automotive exporter with comprehensive global network
